ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | submss.b | |- B = ( Base ` M ) |
| 2 |  | #P_submrcl | |- ( S e. ( SubMnd ` M ) -> M e. Mnd ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` M ) = ( 0g ` M ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( M |`s S ) = ( M |`s S ) |
| 5 | 1, 3, 4 | #P_issubm2 | |- ( M e. Mnd -> ( S e. ( SubMnd ` M ) <-> ( S C_ B /\ ( 0g ` M ) e. S /\ ( M |`s S ) e. Mnd ) ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( S e. ( SubMnd ` M ) -> ( S e. ( SubMnd ` M ) <-> ( S C_ B /\ ( 0g ` M ) e. S /\ ( M |`s S ) e. Mnd ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_ibi | |- ( S e. ( SubMnd ` M ) -> ( S C_ B /\ ( 0g ` M ) e. S /\ ( M |`s S ) e. Mnd ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_simp1d | |- ( S e. ( SubMnd ` M ) -> S C_ B ) |
